001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.training.initializers;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Strategy;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.NeuralNetwork;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.Neuron;
006
007import java.util.Random;
008
009/**
010 * Xavier (Glorot) weight initializer.
011 * <p>
012 * For sigmoid/tanh activations, initializes weights from a uniform
013 * distribution in the range [-limit, limit], where:
014 * <p>
015 * limit = sqrt(6 / (fanIn + fanOut))
016 * <p>
017 * fanIn  = number of input connections (weights)
018 * fanOut = number of output connections (neurons this neuron connects to)
019 * <p>
020 * Bias is left unchanged (usually set separately).
021 */
022@Strategy(Strategy.Role.CONCRETE)
023public class XavierInitializer implements NeuralNetworkInitializer {
024
025    private final Random random;
026
027    /**
028     * Creates a new Xavier initializer with a default, non-deterministic
029     * random number generator.
030     * <p>
031     * This constructor is suitable when reproducibility is not required.
032     * Each run will produce different initial weights.
033     * </p>
034     */
035    public XavierInitializer() {
036        this(new Random());
037    }
038
039    /**
040     * Creates a new Xavier initializer with a seeded random number generator.
041     * <p>
042     * Using a fixed seed makes the initializer deterministic, ensuring that
043     * the same sequence of random numbers (and thus weight initializations)
044     * is produced across runs.
045     * </p>
046     *
047     * @param seed the seed for the random number generator
048     */
049    public XavierInitializer(int seed) {
050        this(new Random(seed));
051    }
052
053    /**
054     * Creates a new Xavier initializer with the given {@link Random} instance.
055     * <p>
056     * This constructor provides maximum flexibility by allowing the caller to
057     * supply a custom random number generator implementation or one shared with
058     * other components.
059     * </p>
060     *
061     * @param random the random number generator to use
062     */
063    public XavierInitializer(Random random) {
064        this.random = random;
065    }
066
067    /**
068     * {@inheritDoc}
069     */
070    @Override
071    public void initialize(NeuralNetwork neuralNetwork, Neuron neuron) {
072        int fanIn = neuron.arity();
073        int fanOut = neuralNetwork.getTargetNeurons(neuron).size();
074
075        float limit = (float) Math.sqrt(6.0f / (fanIn + fanOut));
076
077        for (int d = 1; d <= neuron.arity(); d++) {
078            neuron.setParameter(d, uniform(-limit, limit));
079        }
080        // Bias left unchanged
081    }
082
083    private float uniform(float min, float max) {
084        return min + (max - min) * random.nextFloat();
085    }
086}
